tools.name: chefs_knife
tools.comment: A large, versatile knife (typically 8–10 inches) for chopping, slicing, etc.

tools.name: paring_knife
tools.comment: A small knife (usually 3–4 inches) for detailed work like peeling or trimming.

tools.name: peeler
tools.comment: A handheld tool for removing the outer layer of fruits and vegetables.

tools.name: grater
tools.comment: Used to shred or grate foods like cheese or vegetables into fine pieces.

tools.name: blender
tools.comment: An electric appliance to purée, mix, or emulsify food and other substances.

tools.name: whisk
tools.comment: A utensil made of wire loops used to blend ingredients or incorporate air.

tools.name: mixing_bowl
tools.comment: A bowl in various sizes for combining and mixing ingredients.

tools.name: skillet
tools.comment: A flat-bottomed pan (often with sloped sides) for frying, searing, and sautéing.

tools.name: saucepan
tools.comment: A deep pan with a handle, used for making sauces, soups, or boiling.

tools.name: baking_tray
tools.comment: A flat metal sheet or tray for baking cookies, pastries, or roasting vegetables.

tools.name: rolling_pin
tools.comment: A cylindrical tool used to roll out dough evenly.

tools.name: measuring_spoons
tools.comment: Spoons of various sizes for measuring small quantities of ingredients.

tools.name: mortar_pestle
tools.comment: A bowl (mortar) and a heavy tool (pestle) to grind or crush ingredients.

tools.name: stand_mixer
tools.comment: An electric mixer on a stand with various attachments for kneading or whisking.

tools.name: food_processor
tools.comment: An appliance with interchangeable blades for chopping, mixing, or puréeing.

tools.name: kitchen_thermometer
tools.comment: A device for measuring the internal temperature of foods while cooking.

tools.name: parchment_paper
tools.comment: Non-stick, heat-resistant paper for lining baking sheets or pans.

tools.name: plastic_wrap
tools.comment: Cling film used to cover or wrap food to keep it fresh.

tools.name: aluminum_foil
tools.comment: Thin metal foil used for covering, wrapping, or lining pans.

tools.name: paper_bag
tools.comment: A simple bag made of paper, often used for storing or carrying produce.

tools.name: plastic_bag
tools.comment: Disposable or sealable bag for storing, marinating, or freezing foods.

tools.name: wax_paper
tools.comment: Paper coated with wax, often used for wrapping or layering sticky foods.

tools.name: silicone_baking_mat
tools.comment: A reusable non-stick mat placed on baking sheets.

tools.name: kitchen_twine
tools.comment: Food-grade string for tying roasts or bundling herbs.

tools.name: coffee_filter
tools.comment: Paper filter for brewing coffee or for straining small particles.

tools.name: cheesecloth
tools.comment: Loose-woven cloth used for straining liquids or bundling spices.

tools.name: piping_bag
tools.comment: A cone-shaped bag for piping doughs, creams, or fillings.

tools.name: cupcake_liners
tools.comment: Paper or foil cups placed in a muffin tin to hold batter.
